type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Action When Tame Hit

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_when_tame_hit).

Runs an action when an owner's `TameableEntity` gets harmed by another entity.

Type ID: `apugli:action_when_tame_hit`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:action_when_tame_hit",
    "owner_bientity_action": {
        "type": "origins:add_velocity",
        "z": 2
    }
}
```
This example will push the owner away from any tame's attacker whenever it is hit.
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Action When Tame Hit

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_when_tame_hit).

Runs an action when an owner's `TameableEntity` gets harmed by another entity.

Type ID: `apugli:action_when_tame_hit`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:action_when_tame_hit",
    "owner_bientity_action": {
        "type": "origins:add_velocity",
        "z": 2
    }
}
```
This example will push the owner away from any tame's attacker whenever it is hit.

cooldown.description: The number of ticks the entity has to wait between uses of this power.
cooldown.markdownDescription: The number of ticks the entity has to wait between uses of this power.

hud_render.description: Determines how the resource is visualized on the HUD.
hud_render.markdownDescription: Determines how the resource is visualized on the HUD.

bientity_action.description: If specified, a bi-entity action that applies to the attacker as the actor and the tame as the target.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, a bi-entity action that applies to the attacker as the actor and the tame as the target.

damage_condition.description: If specified, a damage condition that must be met for any actions of this power to run.
damage_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, a damage condition that must be met for any actions of this power to run.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, a bi-entity condition that must be met with the attacker as the actor and tame as the target for any actions of this power to run.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, a bi-entity condition that must be met with the attacker as the actor and tame as the target for any actions of this power to run.

owner_bientity_action.description: If specified, a bi-entity action that must be met with the attacker as the actor and the owner as the target.
owner_bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, a bi-entity action that must be met with the attacker as the actor and the owner as the target.

owner_bientity_condition.description: If specified, a bi-entity condition that must be met with the attacker as the actor and the owner as the target for any actions of this power to run.
owner_bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, a bi-entity condition that must be met with the attacker as the actor and the owner as the target for any actions of this power to run.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Action When Tame Hit (Power Type) date: 2022-03-05

Action When Tame Hit

Power Type.

Runs an action when an owner's TameableEntity gets harmed by another entity.

Type ID: apugli:action_when_tame_hit

Fields

Field Type Default Description
cooldown Integer 1 The number of ticks the entity has to wait between uses of this power.
hud_render Hud Render Determines how the resource is visualized on the HUD.
bientity_action Bi-entity Action optional If specified, a bi-entity action that applies to the attacker as the actor and the tame as the target.
damage_condition Damage Condition optional If specified, a damage condition that must be met for any actions of this power to run.
bientity_condition Bi-entity Condition optional If specified, a bi-entity condition that must be met with the attacker as the actor and tame as the target for any actions of this power to run.
owner_bientity_action Bi-entity Action optional If specified, a bi-entity action that must be met with the attacker as the actor and the owner as the target.
owner_bientity_condition Bi-entity Condition optional If specified, a bi-entity condition that must be met with the attacker as the actor and the owner as the target for any actions of this power to run.

Example

{
    "type": "apugli:action_when_tame_hit",
    "owner_bientity_action": {
        "type": "origins:add_velocity",
        "z": 2
    }
}

This example will push the owner away from any tame's attacker whenever it is hit.
